ext_descriptions.ext_description: The version_or_definition type is a formal mechanism to refer either to a Product_version or to a Product_view_definition.

A Configuration_watched_item identifies, in the context of a Product_concept, an item whose configuration is watched. A Configuration_watched_item may identify a variation of a Product_concept, an entire Product_concept, or some portion thereof.
A Configuration_watched_item may correspond to a component of a contracted product, onto which severe safety rules apply and for which configuration management is therefore particularly controlled. A Configuration_watched_item can be established prior to the existence of a corresponding product.
the identification of the identifier that distinguishes the configuration item.
the words by which the configuration item is known.
the text which describes the configuration item. The value of the attribute need not be specified.
the Product_concept that defines the context in which the configuration item has been defined.

the set of instances of the entity data type Item_design_association that identify products which provide a solution for the configuration item. In this version of the application module, the cardinality of the set shall be not higher than one.

A Item_design_association is the association of a Configuration_watched_item with a Product_view_definition or a Product_version. It specifies that the proposed design is a solution for the Configuration_watched_item.
If the proposed design is a Product_view_definition, the Item_design_association represents the statement that, in the considered definition context, the product version, the Product_view_definition is a definition of, is considered as a way to implement the Configuration_watched_item.
However, it does not involve that this statement is true in all definition contexts of the product version.
If the proposed design is a Product_version, the Item_design_association represents the statement that, in all definition contexts, the Product_version is considered as a way to implement the Configuration_watched_item.
However, it does not involve that this statement is true for other versions of the product.
the Configuration_watched_item for which a product solution is proposed.
the Product_version or the Product_view_definition that identifies a product which provides a solution for the Configuration_watched_item.
There shall be at most one instance of with the same couple of watched_item and proposed_design. However, a product version may be a solution for several configuration items.
